875360.name: Last Alive
875360.description:
Welcome to the dead world. You are the last alive in this world. Now you are alone against monsters - waves of zombies are going to conquer the whole world.

Fight against monsters: your goal is to use all your courage and skills to win.

  • Choose the weapon according to the kind of zombie: pistol, revolver, sawed-off shotgun and double-barrel shotgun;
  • Banish all the zombies - you are the only hope of all 9 worlds.

FEATURES

  • Exciting zombie survival simulator;
  • Lots of weapons to prevent zombie assault.
875360.supported_languages: 英语, 德语, 简体中文, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语
